name: Half Wing
description:
Rita and her parents lived happily in the spirit family of the forest since childhood, but the demons invaded the spirit family, and the fire devoured Rita's home. Rita survived, but her wings were badly damaged and her parents were missing. With the help of spirit elders, eagle and her friends, Rita continues to learn skills and magic, and embarks on the journey of seeking the truth.
This is a free and refreshing pixel RogueLike game, designed a lot of weapons, magic skills and strike action, will let you indulge in them.
We are a 2-person indie game studio, engaged in development for many years. This is a act game on Steam. We spent lots of time to designing the game, hope you like it.
